name: phonebook-backend
description: Backend for the phonebook exercises of Full Stack Open 2019 course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack/osa3/puhelinluettelo && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../phonebook-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Tiina Malinen
